## SelectAsyncProps interface

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface SelectAsyncProps<T> 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { SelectAsyncProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cacheOptions](#cacheoptions-property) | <code>boolean</code> | If cacheOptions is true, then the loaded data will be cached. The cache will remain until cacheOptions changes value. |
|  [defaultOptions](#defaultoptions-property) | <code>boolean &#124; Array&lt;SelectableValue&lt;T&gt;&gt;</code> | When specified as boolean the loadOptions will execute when component is mounted |
|  [loadingMessage](#loadingmessage-property) | <code>string</code> | Message to display when options are loading |
|  [loadOptions](#loadoptions-property) | <code>(query: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;Array&lt;SelectableValue&lt;T&gt;&gt;&gt;</code> | Asynchronously load select options |

### cacheOptions property

If cacheOptions is true, then the loaded data will be cached. The cache will remain until cacheOptions changes value.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
cacheOptions?: boolean;
```

### defaultOptions property

When specified as boolean the loadOptions will execute when component is mounted

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
defaultOptions?: boolean | Array<SelectableValue<T>>;
```

### loadingMessage property

Message to display when options are loading

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
loadingMessage?: string;
```

### loadOptions property

Asynchronously load select options

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
loadOptions?: (query: string) => Promise<Array<SelectableValue<T>>>;
```
